overview: THE GOLDEN BREED IS A FILM ABOUT THE GREAT SURFERS OF OUR TIME. THE GOLDEN BREED IS NOT JUST A SURF MOVIE, BUT AN EMOTIONAL EXPERIENCE. THE BREED NOT ONLY GOES IN FOR SOME OF THE HOTTEST SMALL WAVE RIDING AND BIG WAVES, BUT SPORTS LIKE MOTORCYCLING, SKY DIVING, GUTTER SLIDING, AND MANY MORE. LISTEN AS THE WORLD'S GREATEST SURFERS NARRATE THEMSELVES FOR THE PERSONAL TOUCH WHICH PROVES THIS FILM WAS MADE FOR YOU.
title: The Golden Breed
